main event: A sighting of an unidentified object described as possibly an aircraft silhouette larger than a C-47, with orange-red and blue colors, was reported on April 8, 1956.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a silhouette of a plane larger than a C-47,Witnesses observed an orange-red flashing light,There were speculations about the object possibly being a balloon or aircraft,The sighting involved visual observation from the ground,The report is a part of Project Blue Book documentation.
sighted object: unidentified object possibly resembling an aircraft
